long_description: Bad with numbers? Our REI TSA Indicator Wordlock uses letters instead of numbers so you can set your own combination with an easily remembered word or expression. Lock is recognized and accepted by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA). TSA airport screeners have a secured set of keys to open Travel Sentry(TM) locks, allowing access without damaging the lock. Pop-up alert shows traveler if lock has been opened by TSA agents during inspection. Resettable 4-dial combination spells over 1,000 English words and expressions.
short_description: Bad with numbers? Our REI TSA Indicator Wordlock uses letters instead of numbers so you can set your own combination with an easily remembered word or expression.
